transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji madam ji kaise ho?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Ji ji. Unique Handicraft ka account aapke hath mein hai na?
Customer: Haan bataiye sir.
Executive: Madam ispe kal se mere pe sirf only message aa raha hai miss call ka call puri nahi aa rahi hai mere paas aur iski vajah se mera response rate ghatta ja raha hai.
Customer: Sir to buyer ke location se na network issue hoga na to wo call drop ho gaya hoga. Maine already sir sir aapse jab last baat hui thi na
Executive: Ji ji suniye meri baat suniye ek ho ja do ho ja teen ho ja kal jab tak kitni call drop hai wo dekho mera 77 percent tha kal aur 83 percent badh gaya hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To isse to mujhe nuksan hai na isse to meri wo ghat rahi hai na
Customer: Aapki November mein November I think nine hote hain theek hai nine call aayi hai aapne teen miss kiya hai baki chhe call aapki uthi hai teen miss dikha raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Nahi abhi bhi abhi ki foreign ki bhi miss call hi dikha raha hai wo call hi nahi aa rahi mere paas to.
Customer: Sir call nahi aa rahi hai main wahi aapko batana chah rahi hu sir ki agar call nahi aa rahi hai to main wahi aapko batana chah rahi hu call abhi mere ko nine dikh raha hai jisme se six answer hua hai three miss hui hai theek hai aur call connectivity ki jo problem aap mujhe bata rahe ho call connectivity mein might ye bhi reason ho sakta hai ki waha pe call hai aapki.
Executive: Suno suno madam.
Customer: Location se drop ho sakta hai ya buyer ne galti se call kiya aur turant usne call drop kar diya aapko agar fir bhi issue hai main team se aapko ek test call karwa le rahi hu theek hai.
Executive: Nahi test call na karwao aap mujhe aap mujhe sirf account ko thoda sa dekh lijiye account mera niche kai din din niche ja raha hai ye.
Customer: Sir aapke account ki listing niche nahi dikh rahi hai account ki listing wahi pe dikh rahi hai sir account ki kahin se kyunki agar ye nau ke nau call miss hue hote main kehti haan aapka listing invisible ho jayega lekin nau mein se aapne chhe call uthaye hain teen aapka
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Teen hi miss dikha raha hai aapko to main aapko wahi kehna chah rahi hu account ki main already aapse last call pe jab meri baat hui thi na tabhi bhi maine is cheez ko sahi se wo kiya tha aur aapka jo kyunki aap active ho aap lead management pe reply call back sab kuch kar rahe ho.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Aapka yaha pe jo ho raha hai wo kaam pura proper apne end se ho raha hai agar ye nau ki nau hoti na to problem hota fir bhi main ek kaam karti hu main isse check karwa lungi team ke sath aap mujhe iske alava mujhe bataiye ki iske alava aur kya dikkat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi bas iske alava aur dikkat to koi aisi aa nahi rahi filhal theek hai bas theek thaak chal raha hai filhal sab.
Customer: Abhi recent mein hi aapke D rank paanch dikh raha hai main use add karwa du aapke catalog mein?
Executive: Kya dikh raha hai?
Customer: D matlab ek kuch product aise hain jiski aap by lead consume kar rahe ho but wo product aapke catalog mein add nahi hai jaise brass spice box decorate wooden box.
Executive: Nahi wo decorate wala laga dena brass wala wo rehne dena fir uske according sari brass ki aayegi fir wo lead waha pe.
Customer: Plastic dry fruit box ki bhi aapne consume ki hai aur aapne
Executive: Suno suno meri baat wo plastic wali ho gayi hogi galti se chote wale bhai se to plastic wala to rehne do aap wo kuch na kariye usme baki account theek chal raha hai isme koi dikkat nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Plastic dry fruit box nahi karte hain to aap isko delete kijiye kyunki aapne consume kar liya hai to aapko plastic dry box ki leads aa rahi hogi theek hai decorative wooden box mein decorative wooden box mein aapki by lead consume kiya hai spice box mein bhi aapne char by lead consume kiya hai field dry fruits gift box mein aapne char by lead consume kiya hai to aapka jo wo jo spice box hai na wahi dry fruit mein kaam aata hai wahi spice box mein kaam aata hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: To sir lekin ab jo main mere ko paanch product aise dikh rahe hain jiske aapne aapne usse catalog mein add nahi kiya hai but aap uski by lead consume kar rahe hain to main to aapse jab discuss kar rahi hu sir to main to discuss karungi na ab aapne aapke bhai ko bata dijiye ki kyunki aap jo product add nahi hai aur agar uski by lead aap kharid rahe ho to hamara kaam ye hota hai ki aapse wo product add karwana kyunki agar hum add nahi karwayenge to fir listing and visibility wahi dikhne lag jayegi.
Executive: Nahi koi nahi main samjhaunga usko brass mein plastic mein kaam nahi karunga seedha phone mein kaam karunga.
Customer: Haan aur ye agar ye paancho mein agar aap deal nahi karte by mistake aapne consume kar liya to ye paancho ko aap waha se hata dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai madam.
Customer: Aap settings mein jaake jo maine aapko bataya tha settings mein jaake category preference mein jaake aapko click karke hatana hai.
Executive: Theek hai madam theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai ek cheez ye ho gaya dusri cheez main aapko ye puch rahi thi ki aapne isi ke liye subah customer care pe call kiya tha kya unique handicraft?
Executive: Ji ji isi ke liye kara tha.
Customer: Achha theek hai sir main ise close kar rahi hu aapka theek hai and aapke paas service feedback jayega please apne bhai ko samjha dijiyega agar unko koi training chahiye hoga to please aap mere number pe call kar lijiyega sir.
Executive: Theek hai madam theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai aap mere number pe call kar lijiyega so that ki main aapko guide karwa dungi unko agar koi use karne mein training chahiye hogi to.
Executive: Theek hai madam.
Customer: Theek hai madam. Okay sir thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving missed calls only.

- Response rate decreasing due to call issues.

- Account listing going down.



Resolution:

- Explained that network issues can cause call drops.

- Clarified the number of missed and answered calls.

- Offered to arrange a test call.

- Explained how to remove unwanted product categories.

- Offered training for the customer's brother.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will explain to his brother about product categories.

- Customer will call the executive for training if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, call connectivity, listing, training
